topic.title: Great Back to ZeroNet
topic.body: reinstalled ZeroNet , but I have lost my original ZeroID,what a pity.

47_1FHN4oukAG7zFUpiC9L2iz7QpQVTuT3xkz.body:
> [nekox](#comment_230_1GVM7nNzmYJ3ppPCmDTPLozrJF2Z9mgFpF): 你用代理的时候，会先把数据发到CDN上，然后CDN在转发到代理服务器。而GFW是万万不敢封CDN的

but you should have  a lot of domain names, GFW can block any domains whose traffic seems to be 
suspicious by GFW

> [nekox](#comment_231_1GVM7nNzmYJ3ppPCmDTPLozrJF2Z9mgFpF): 很多国外的网站都用CDN，要是把CDN封了要挂掉一大片国外网站

what about if GFW reaches all IPs behind your domains ?

> [nekox](#comment_232_1GVM7nNzmYJ3ppPCmDTPLozrJF2Z9mgFpF): GFW怎么reach？


How can GFW not?  GFW is not a simple software,but a bundle of weapons equipped with national supported hardwares and facilities .it can do any damage it wants to.
